title: Crystlon's Pixel Art

[[/tab]]

[[tab About Me]]
[[=]]
**About Me**
[[/=]]
-----
Hello, I exist!

I discovered this site in 2016, and I joined in 2017, only getting invested in the later half of the year. I'm not really much of a writer, so I decided to post some of my pixel art. People liked it, so I made an art page, then I updated my art style --twice-- a few times, then you started reading this.

My pixel art used to look like solid-colored blobs, but I've since developed a more refined and cartoony art style. That's not to say it's my only style, though; I have an enormous amount of sprite work for mods that I'll never get around to making.

[[/tab]]
[[/tabview]]
